thread.title: UFC Fight Night 105 medical suspensions: Travis Browne among 10 fighters issued lengthy sentences
thread.title_full: UFC Fight Night 105 medical suspensions: Travis Browne among 10 fighters issued lengthy sentences

author: MMA Fighting Newswire
title: UFC Fight Night 105 medical suspensions: Travis Browne among 10 fighters issued lengthy sentences
text: share Tom Szczerbowski-USA TODAY Sports Heavyweight headliner Travis Browne highlighted a list of 10 fighters who received lengthy medical suspensions in the aftermath of UFC Fight Night 105, according to information released Thursday to MMA Fighting by the Nova Scotia Boxing Authority. Browne suffered a nasty second-round knockout loss to UFC heavyweight contender Derrick Lewis in the night’s main event, which took place Feb. 19 at the Scotiabank Centre in Halifax, Nova Scotia, Canada., and aired live on FOX Sports 1. As a result, Browne will be forced to seek doctor’s clearance on a CT scan prior to returning to competition or sit out 180 days, per commission orders. The nine other fighters who received similar suspensions for various potential injuries were: Johny Hendricks , Cezar Ferreira , Sara McMann , Gina Mazany , Alessandro Ricci , Nordine Taleb , Aiemann Zahabi , Reginaldo Vieira , and Ryan Janes . A complete list of UFC Fight Night 105’s medical suspensions can be seen below. Travis Browne: Suspended 180 days pending doctor’s clearance on negative CT scan; minimum suspension of 60 days Johny Hendricks: Suspended 180 days pending doctor’s clearance on left hand x-ray; minimum suspension of 7 days Cezar Ferreira: Suspended 180 days pending orthopedic clearance on hand injury; minimum suspension of 30 days Sara McMann: Suspended 180 days pending ophthalmologist clearance; minimum suspension of 7 days Gina Mazany: Suspended 180 days pending doctor’s clearance on right hand x-ray; minimum suspension of 30 days Alessandro Ricci: Suspended 180 days pending doctor’s clearance; minimum suspension of 60 days Nordine Taleb: Suspended 180 days pending doctor’s clearance on nasal fracture; minimum suspension of 60 days no contest, 45 days no contact Aiemann Zahabi: Suspended 180 days pending ophthalmologist clearance; minimum suspension of 30 days Reginaldo Vieira: Suspended 180 days pending orthopedic clearance on hand injury; minimum suspension of 30 days Ryan Janes: Suspended 180 days pending orthopedic clearance; minimum suspension of 30 days Randa Markos : Suspended 45 days no contest, 30 days no contact due to hard bout Jack Marshman : Suspended 45 days no contest, 30 days no contact for right infraorbital laceration, scalp laceration, and TKO Derrick Lewis: Suspended 30 days no contest, 21 days no contact Hector Lombard : Suspended 30 days, requires doctor’s clearance to return Sam Sicilia : Suspended 30 days, requires doctor’s clearance to return Santiago Ponzinibbio : Suspended 30 days no contest, 21 days no contact due to a right cheek laceration, requires doctor’s clearance to return Carla Esparza : Suspended 30 days no contest, 21 days no contact due to hard bout Thiago Santos : Suspended 30 days no contest, 21 days no contact due to hard bout, requires doctor’s clearance to return
